item.title: Golang introduction
item.description: This is for those interested in the go programming language. This is my take as an introduction on this amazing language Honestly there is plenty of resources on the web about golang to fill a lot of content. This post is merely a summary of the things I find most useful and what attracts me the most while programming in go TL; DR To install simply download the package for your OS in the golang official download page
